Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: http://www.skotos.net/IronclawGame/images/map.jpg
wide hall

A wide entry hall, carved carefully from stone by caring hands. Each detail shows the craftsmanship of Doloreaux masons, from the highly polished marble of the floor, to the sturdy, smooth stone of the walls. Two tapestries of elaborate design are flanked on each side by four sets of weaponry, and eight suits of armor that stand guard along the east, and west walls. A pomegranate bordered, emerald carpet leads southward, to a pair of elaborately carved ivory marble double doors that are framed on either side by a pair of small, potted pomegranate trees, and northward to a pair of ivory marble double doors. Two lotus blossom chandeliers dangle from the ceiling, accompanied by various flags and banners.

Your footsteps echo as you step upon the smooth marble tile of a wide hall. Adorned with tapestries, banners, mounted weaponry, and suits of armor, the masonry of the stone walls is exquisite, hand chisled and polished to a near pefect state, and complemented by carved mahogany trim. Two chandeliers dangle from the ceiling, accompanied by various flags and banners. There are a pair of ivory marble doors to the north, and a pair of gem-inlaid double doors to the south

A wide hall adorned with tapestries, banners, mounted weaponry, and suits of armor. The masonry is exquisite, hand chiseled and polished to a near perfect state, and complemented by carved mahogany trim. Two chandeliers dangle from the ceiling, accompanied by various flags and banners. There are a pair of ivory marble doors to the north, and a pair of gem-inlaid double doors to the south
http://wp.skotos.net/ironclaw/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/maps/Mini_Maps/NewTown_South/Manors/Doloreaux/dolo-entry-hall.jpg
pair of elaborately carved doors leading to the courtyard

A rounded set of green stained mahogany doors, leading into the courtyard. They are carved down the center with a silver limned pomegranate, the symbol of the Noble House Doloreaux. They open outward, splitting the symbol in half, and welcome all visitors with the gentle flow of scents from the varied flora without.

A rounded set of green stained mahogany doors, leading into the courtyard. They are carved down the center with a silver limned pomegranate, the symbol of the Noble House Doloreaux. They open outward, splitting the symbol in half, and welcome all visitors with the gentle flow of scents from the varied flora without.
a pair of elaborately carved, gem-inlaid double doors

Created from single pieces of ivory colored marble, the double doors to the south have been carved to depict a design of twining trees, decorated here and there with leaf shaped emeralds as big as a hand, smoothly polished lapis blossoms, and amethyst dusted bark on the trunks. The doors stand nearly cathedral high, and are framed on either side by small, potted pomegranate trees.

A pair of doors created from single pieces of ivory colored marble. They have been carved into the shape of twining trees with various gems adding color to the bark, and acting as blossoms, or leaves.
suit of regal armor
a suit of steel armor, positioned at attention east of the northeast passage. It holds a steal tipped spear between two gauntlets, and the hollow space of it's helm's visor endlessly stares outward.
suit of regal armor
a suit of steel armor, positioned at attention west of the northwest passage. It holds a steal tipped spear between two gauntlets, and the hollow space of it's helm's visor endlessly stares outward.
suit of regal armor
a suit of steel armor, positioned at attention east of the southeast door. It holds a steal tipped spear between two gauntlets, and the hollow space of it's helm's visor endlessly stares outward.
suit of regal armor
a suit of steel armor, positioned at attention west of the southwest door. It holds a steal tipped spear between two gauntlets, and the hollow space of it's helm's visor endlessly stares outward.
the various banners and flags hanging from the ceiling

Various banners and flags hang from the ceiling of the Hall. Among these are represented minor Households from throughout Calabria with whom the Doloreaux are known to have friendship. The most noticeable banners are the Lutaran Symbol, and the Doloreaux Battle Flag, larger than the rest, dangling from the center of the ceiling.
pomegranate bordered emerald carpet

an elaborately embroidered carpet, bordered with a pomegranate pattern depicting the emblem of the Noble House Doloreaux. Gold trim is set about the edges, and wanders in a consistent maze-like pattern all the way around the edge. This carpet occupies the middle center of the room lengthwise from north to south, revealing four feet of polished marble flooring on either side.
green brass lotus blossom chandelier

An elaborate, multi-tiered chandelier made of green brass, and faceted glass. The center of the chandelier extends downwards, with an array of curved, crystalline glass petals surrounding the highest reaches of the brass body. Curling both upward, and down, each fragile petal has been framed in delicate green brass fittings, to give the appearance of an upside-down lotus blossom. Fine chains dangle from the center of the flower, from which hang a mass of glass orbs, that house a multitude of candles.
A chandelier made into the shape of a lotus blossom from fine, crystalline glass petals, framed by green brass.
green brass lotus blossom chandelier

An elaborate, multi-tiered chandelier made of green brass, and faceted glass. The center of the chandelier extends downwards, with an array of curved, crystalline glass petals surrounding the highest reaches of the brass body. Curling both upward, and down, each fragile petal has been framed in delicate green brass fittings, to give the appearance of an upside-down lotus blossom. Fine chains dangle from the center of the flower, from which hang a mass of glass orbs, that house a multitude of candles.
A chandelier made into the shape of a lotus blossom from fine, crystalline glass petals, framed by green brass.

hunting tapestry

A tapestry of interwoven green and silver fibers. The scene depicts a dozen boar warriors surrounding a ferocious Uadh-chrith. Several of the warriors seem to be distracting the beast, while others bravely attempt to mount the beast. It hangs in the center of the west wall, and is flanked on either side by a display of weapons.

a tapestry, designed of green and silver cloth woven sturdily together to depict a scene of many boar warriors hunting a ferocious gigantic beast. It hangs in the center of the west wall, and is flanked on either side by a display of weapons.
tapestry depicting a great battle

A tapestry of interwoven silver and green fibers. The scene depicts a mighty battle of boar warriors in armor charging against a line of horse warriors. Many seem to have fallen on either side, yet the bravery of the boars is seen, tusks to the ground, as they charge with weapons ready towards their enemies. It hangs in the center of the east wall, and is flanked on either side by a display of weapons.

a tapestry, designed of silver and green cloth woven sturdily together to depict a scene of boar warriors making a brave charge against horse warriors. It hangs It hangs in the center of the east wall, and is flanked on either side by a display of weapons.
the eastern wall

The polished gray stone wall is carefully crafted and maintained by the expert stonemasons of the noble house Doloreaux. Each block stacks one upon the other fitting securely to complete the wall and prevent light or weather from filtering through. The walls are trimmed with mahogany paneling depicting ivy leaves and various Doloreaux and Lutaran symbols of significance. The wall is approximately 18 feet from floor to ceiling.
The polished gray stone wall. The wall is approximately 18 feet from floor to ceiling.
the northern wall

the western wall

display of weapons

an axe, and longsword of equal length meet diagonally in the center of the display, the sword blade angled upward to the west, the axe-blade angled to the east facing outward. aligned in the center is a long spear, with cloth of emerald and green tied near the spear point. A round metal buckler with a Doloreaux insignia as it's device hides where the three weapons meet. The display flanks the east side of the hunting tapestry.
display of weapons

A round metal buckler with a Doloreaux insignia as it's device hides where the three weapons meet. The display flanks the west side of the hunting tapestry.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "You catch the muffled sound of the evening bell."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "The deep sound of midday bells is heard from outside."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "Outside, the bells announce midnight."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "The church bells herald the morning."); return TRUE;
